text:
Thank you! I’m really glad. I am wondering too.

I’ve been considering the MA - I’m not sure if it’s too late to transfer yet though. I’ll ask my tutors about it. If I can move into the industry now I’d rather do that but I do think the masters would be a good backup.

Thank you!

That’s a good point. I’d say about 80% of QVFX are animators so I haven’t spoken to any 2D artists there. I’ve got a few ideas otherwise. That’s very true.
Only downside with MA is apart from financing not sure the advantage over online courses like FXPhd or whatever when you'd be remote anyway.

That's true. There's no feasible way for me to fund any other course by myself right now so the integrated MA would be the only realistic option. Hopefully next year would only be partially remote, if at all, but there's no guarantees about that either way
